name: Oh HI Doggy !
description:
The goal of the game is to finish the level by going on the RIGHT

The dogs can :

  • Arrow Keys : Move around (select single or two players)
  • Z : Jump (validate)

Caution if you touch a cat, you'll loose a heart. But if you have clones, the clone will disappear instead.

The Power-Up item will allow you to produce a new clone.

This game was made with the fantasy console TIC-80
